snippet: Brett Hundley threw two touchdown passes and ran for two more scores to help No. 17 U.C.L.A. rout Virginia Tech in the Sun Bowl in El Paso.
abstract: Brett Hundley throws two touchdown passes and runs for two more scores to help No 17 UCLA rout Virginia Tech, 42-12, in the Sun Bowl in El Paso, Texas.
lead_paragraph: Brett Hundley threw two touchdown passes and ran for two more scores to help No. 17 U.C.L.A. rout Virginia Tech in the Sun Bowl in El Paso.

headline.main: U.C.L.A. Wins Bowl in a Rout
headline.print_headline: U.C.L.A. Wins Bowl in a Rout
